A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars the Last Jedi is able to create tense moments unlike any other movie I've seen in the past few years. Along with this\, the character journey of Luke is astounding\, as well as Poe's\, Kylo's and Rey. While the Rose/Finn arc doesn't shine as bright as the others\, it still provides Finn with a very important growth in becoming a resistance hero. Johnson succeeds in many ways\, with overall storytelling\, character development\, tension\, camera \nshots and more. The hype was well worth it.
